data.title: Anil Kapoor, Anupam Kher, Siddharth, Sridevi, Rana Daggubati, Raveen Tandon mourn the death of Daggubati Ramanaidu
meta_keywords: Tollywood mourns the death of legendary filmmaker D Ramanaidu
data.meta_description:
Anil Kapoor, Anupam Kher, Siddharth, Sridevi, Rana Daggubati, Raveen Tandon mourn the death of Daggubati Ramanaidu - The Dadasaheb Phalke Award winning producer-filmmaker breathed his last yesterday
Daggubati Ramanaidu breathed his last yesterday. The ace producer …
data.text:
The Dadasaheb Phalke Award winning producer-filmmaker breathed his last yesterday

Daggubati Ramanaidu breathed his last yesterday. The ace producer is a big name not just in the south but also in Bollywood. He has worked with many B-Town bigwigs and they have all come out in condoling his death. The legendary producer has made more than 17 films in Bollywood where actors like Rajesh Khanna, Jeetendra, Anil Kapoor, Fardeen Khan and others have worked with him.

He was reported to be suffering from prostate cancer. Popularly known as movie mogul, Ramanaidu was the founder of Suresh Productions. The film production house he had set up, has produced over 150 films in about 15 Indian languages. In fact, he received prestigious Guinness Book of World Records for this feat. He is also the grandfather to popular Telugu heroes like Rana Dagubatti and Naga Chaitanya, and father to Daggubati Venketesh.

While the entire nation came to a stand still due to the sad demise of Ramanaidu, B-Towners are doing the same...

Stay tuned to BollywoodLife for the latest scoops and updates from Bollywood, Hollywood, South, TV and Web-Series.
